items.description: Automated testing for IP/MPLS systems, improving release reliability and coverage. Built scalable test environments and integrated automation into CI pipelines. Collaborated across teams to deliver stable and high-quality releases.
Officiates as a Referee and Assistant Referee for youth and adult high-performance leagues. Conflict management and high-pressure decision-making in a fast-paced environment.
Built and documented VMware-based training systems. Identified and mitigated security issues in virtual environments.
Taught embedded systems labs and guided students in debugging and circuit design.
Tested and commissioned metro interlocking systems during trial operations. Supported customers with troubleshooting and on-site validation.
Tested DCS network systems for Shanghai transit. Assisted in debugging and network design validation.
Supported exhibitions through client and supplier engagement.
Assisted in developing the "Shanghai Food Safety Platform" application. Supported operations and product content traceability research.
